attributes.additional_details: The reimbursement of elected Members of Parliament should solely be comprised of; any social security benefits commensurate with their current financial/employment status + a local authority provided house, rent free, in their constituency suitable for immediate family + a 1 bedroomed local authority provided flat in the Greater London area + free public transport within the UK and between officially sanctioned international destinations + central government funded office space and administrative support in the Member's constituency and in Westminster.
